The movie was generally good; the only complaint I have was that it seemed to drag on far too much. The parts that actually contained some action or suspense were great, but the rest of the movie was either a bit too dry or simply boring. I'm glad I watched it, but I definitely wouldn't sit through 2+ hours to see it again.
Thanks again to FXG. My wife are really enjoying you guys. You all are her new Netflix!
